entry.title: Monday night: Chance of wet flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain or light wet snow changing to light wet snow this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of wet flurries. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of wet flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
